title: Bug 49890: Nio Selector issue on Linux platform
description: Bug 49890: Nio Selector issue on Linux platform. Created attachment 25997: NioEndpoint.java and simple web applications. Sometimes, the server's CPU reaches 100% and remains at 100% until restart. This issue has been reproduced with Java versions 1.6.007, 1.6.018, and 1.6.021. It appears to be a duplicate of issue Bug 46373. The Jetty team has fixed a similar problem, as seen here: http://jira.codehaus.org/browse/JETTY937?focusedCommentId=168060&page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels:comment-tabpanel. I have added some logging to NioEndpoint.java.
OB: With this logging, we can observe that the selector.select(timeout) function occasionally returns zero keys on the Linux platform.
